items.name: Yaren Sunset Point & Café
items.short_description: Discover breathtaking panoramic ocean views as the sun dips below the horizon, paired with refreshing local beverages and snacks. A perfect spot for evening relaxation and photography.

items.name: Nauru Marine Discovery Centre
items.short_description: Dive into the wonders of Nauru's vibrant marine life through interactive exhibits and a small touch tank. Learn about local conservation efforts and the island's unique coral ecosystems.
items.address: Near Nauru International Airport, Yaren District

items.name: Topside View Walkway
items.short_description: Explore a newly constructed elevated walkway offering unique perspectives of Nauru's 'Topside' phosphate landscape and lush regrowth. Ideal for nature enthusiasts and photographers.

items.name: Nauru Cultural Heritage Hub
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in Nauruan traditions with a rotating display of artifacts, storytelling sessions, and live demonstrations of traditional crafts. A living museum celebrating the island's rich past.

items.name: Yaren Community Market Plaza
items.short_description: A vibrant, newly designed market space offering fresh local produce, handmade goods, and delicious street food. Experience the heart of Yaren's community on market days.

items.name: Anibare Bay Kayak & Paddleboard Hire
items.short_description: Discover the serene beauty of Anibare Bay with newly available kayak and paddleboard rentals. Glide over clear waters and enjoy the calm, picturesque coastline.

items.name: Buada Lagoon Birdwatching Deck
items.short_description: A tranquil, elevated platform offering prime views of Buada Lagoon, Nauru's only freshwater lake, and its diverse birdlife. A haven for nature lovers and bird enthusiasts.
items.address: Buada Lagoon Access Road, Yaren District

items.name: Nauru Eco-Park & Picnic Grounds
items.short_description: A newly developed green space with walking trails, native plant gardens, and family-friendly picnic areas. Enjoy a peaceful escape into Nauru's natural flora.

items.name: Phosphate Story Interpretive Centre
items.short_description: Uncover the powerful history of Nauru's phosphate mining industry through interactive exhibits, historical photographs, and personal accounts. Understand its impact on the island and its people.
items.address: Near the Old Cantilevers, Yaren District

items.name: Nauru Star-Gazing Platform
items.short_description: Escape city lights and witness the incredible brilliance of the Southern Hemisphere night sky from a dedicated, dark-sky viewing platform. Perfect for astronomy enthusiasts.
